# HUD::USE_FAKE_MP_CASH

## Summary
Dipslays the playes cash

## Parameters
* **BOOL** useFakeMPCash

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Related to displaying cash on the HUD
Always called before HUD::CHANGE_FAKE_MP_CASH in decompiled scripts
